1.1.hd_quote: Time is everything. You have to wait for it and there is nothing that you can do.
1.1.behavioral_axis: Waits for creative impulses without forcing them, surrendering to mutation's timing rather than willpower.
1.1.shadow_axis: Tries to control creative output through ego and willpower, becoming unstable and distorted when pushing revolution.
1.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.2.hd_quote: The required harmony between established values and ideals that enriches inspiration.
1.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally embodies unique creative expression, called out when others recognize this innate difference.
1.2.shadow_axis: Gets interfered with by others who pump up the ego, placing desire and passion into uniqueness instead of letting it unfold naturally.
1.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.3.hd_title: The energy to sustain creative work
1.3.hd_quote: Material forces can disrupt creativity and lead to overambition.
1.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial-and-error, learning what works by discovering what doesn't, pushing through interference with sustained energy.
1.3.shadow_axis: Gets pulled away from unique creative process by material forces and commercial possibilities, selling out mutation to mundane security.
1.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.4.hd_title: Aloneness as the medium of creativity
1.4.hd_quote: Aloneness as the medium of creativity, not as the medium for contribution, just for the creativity.
1.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes the need for aloneness to protect the creative process, staying one-tracked in protecting studio boundaries.
1.4.shadow_axis: Abandons aloneness to externalize and market the mutation, spending creative energy trying to get recognition instead of sustaining solitary creativity.
1.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.5.hd_quote: This assumption that one is creative is very attractive to society.
1.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under society's constant projection of creative talent, enduring interference through powerful ego while attracting mutation out into the world.
1.5.shadow_axis: Performs the creative role to satisfy projections, becoming increasingly eccentric for attention until the game crashes and they become famous has-beens.
1.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.6.hd_quote: You will never live long enough to appreciate the impact of that mutation.
1.6.behavioral_axis: Waits on a long horizon and lets time test which mutations endure, offering role-model objectivity across generations.
1.6.shadow_axis: Mistakes early subjective preference for objective truth, facing disappointment when time reveals the mutation was merely fashion, not transcendent.
1.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
